Control Name: 2.14. Ensure ASC Default policy setting 'Monitor SQL Auditing' is not 'Disabled'
Control Statement: When this setting is enabled, it recommends that access auditing for the Azure Database be enabled for compliance, advanced threat detection, and for investigation purposes
